pl.ais.commons.domain.specification

Interface Specification<C>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - determines the type of candidate
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompositeSpecification<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AfterSpecification, AllConstraint, AndSpecification, AnyConstraint, BeforeSpecification, BlankSpecification, Constraint, EmptyConstraint, EmptySpecification, FitIntoSpecification, IsEqualSpecification, NotBlankConstraint, NotSpecification, OrSpecification, RegexSpecification, RequiredConstraint, TrueSpecification, ValidEmailConstraint, ValidEmailSpecification

    public interface Specification<C>
    Defines the API contract for the Specification.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL
    See Also:
    Specification Pattern

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends C> 
      boolean      		 isSatisfiedBy(T candidate)
      Verifies if this specification is matched by the candidate.

    • Method Detail

      • isSatisfiedBy

        <T extends C> boolean isSatisfiedBy(T candidate)
        Verifies if this specification is matched by the candidate.
        Type Parameters:
        T - determines the upper bound for the candidate type
        Parameters:
        candidate - the candidate to verify
        Returns:
        true if this specification is matched by the candidate, false otherwise
